name: electric_studio
description: Dark minimal with neon accents. Clean typography with animated reveals.
signature_elements: Neon green accent on dark black
extra_css: .tag { font-family: monospace; font-size: var(--small-size); text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.15em; color: var(--accent); } .divider { width: 60px; height: 2px; background: var(--accent); margin: 1rem 0; }
